document_data.name: Protection From Aging
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from aging''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Labelas Enoreth]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell protected the caster or a targeted creature from unnatural aging. This included the effects of time-based spells and the effect of seeing a [[ghost]].
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, the holy symbol of Labelas Enoreth and a black [[sapphire]] with a value of at least 50 [[gp]], crushed into a powder.
